Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Adam Schiff paid witnesses over $40 million to testify against Trump. This is not supported by any evidence and is deemed as fabricated.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or credible sources provided to back up the assertion that Adam Schiff paid witnesses.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Schiff did not pay any witnesses to testify in the impeachment inquiry against Trump.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the information provided is true without verifying its authenticity or credibility.
